storyInfo: Texas once rejected everything, but now she chooses to stand firm. There is no place for Lappland in Siracusa, and she doesn't need one anyway.

attributes.content: Recon complete. No hostiles sighted.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The route map they gave us sure is nifty. We actually managed to get here first without any real obstacles along the way.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: All the tech used in the new city's design comes from Columbia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It has lots of functionality that none of the mafiosi ever understood.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: For example, the road leading directly to the control tower will be blocked off after we pass through.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: They've also managed to block other intersections with various methods.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Not to mention, what we saw along the way.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The conflicts between the famiglie have been spreading. At this point, even if any of them wanted to attack the control tower, another famiglia would get in the way.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Most importantly, they'd never expect us to take it from right under their noses.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: That's right. However, it's too soon to rest on our laurels.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The Bellones, Rossatis, and Saluzzos. Those three famiglie will never give up the secondary core area. They will definitely make an appearance.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: With me and Texas here, you've got nothing to worry about.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sorry, I wasn't trying to get you dragged into this mess.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I chose to do this.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Same here! And in exchange, I'll need you to tell me where I can get the best pizza!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Deal.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You said the tech here comes from Columbia.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: That's right. Famiglia Rossati laid most of the groundwork, so I'm a little concerned they'll have some way of breaking through.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If there's one place they have no choice but to pass through, where would that be?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Something's not right here.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You feel it too?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: It has something to do with the other famiglie getting in the way, but...
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: While it's possible that big gate over there might've been activated accidentally...
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: We've been taking detours for a while now, and I'm pretty sure these blockades were set here on purpose.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: In other words... someone's one step ahead of us?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Yes, and they also happen to be very familiar with the area.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: And only the Rossatis fit that bill.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: The only other possibility would be those who helped in the conversion of the secondary core area.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Let's not worry about who it could be for now.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: How do we break through?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I can give it a try. One of my soldiers should know how.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: We're wasting too much time.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: And...
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: If someone really set this up on purpose, they'll definitely have a backup plan.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I know what you're going to say.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Even though we haven't had the most fun partnering here, we're about to the part where our agreement formally ends.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Guess so.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You know, in a sense, we're brothers in misfortune.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: We have nothing in common.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Am I wrong though?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I can already tell that you're a guy with a smart look to him, but you're actually a complete idiot, loyal to a fault. Same as me.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Don't bother trying to talk yourself up like that. Nobody's buying it.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I'm not looking for excuses here. I know what I'm doing, and I don't regret it.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: But if what you said is true and your boss was the one who set all of this in motion, you're probably gonna find yourself standing against your own fratelli.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Are you prepared to do what you've gotta do?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Will you really get what you're looking for?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: How about you? Did you get what you were looking for?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: No, I've got a guilty conscience, but there's nothing I can do about it.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Your Honor, I found the control tower technicians hiding in one of the rooms.
attributes.name: Bailiff

attributes.content: They want to talk to you.
attributes.name: Bailiff

attributes.content: Deal.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You're... a judge?!
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'm not here to hurt you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'm not here on behalf of any famiglia, or Signora Sicilia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Then who are you here for?
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: Right now, no one.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: As long as you don't hurt us, we should be able to help you.
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: I want to ask you something first.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: Who told you to start the separation sequence of the secondary core area? Was it a mafioso from Famiglia Bellone?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: He said he was the don of Famiglia Bellone, Bernardo.
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: It really was you... Bernardo.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Did you have to do this all for the sake of your so-called power?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: He also asked me if I had ever imagined what Siracusa would look like without famiglie.
attributes.name: Calm Technician

attributes.content: What did you say...?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Up ahead is the central facility that controls that gate, isn't it?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Rossati Mafioso

attributes.content: Then—
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Life keeps bringing us together, doesn't it? Cellinia.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: That's right. Only one of us can walk out of this alive.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Lavinia...? The judge?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: We followed your instructions and not to break through right away. We took some detours and nabbed ourselves a government guy. That's what he told us.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: She's already taken the control tower.
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: I have to admit, no famiglia would've thought such an insignificant judge could pull off something like that with just a few paper pushers.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: But, even if she managed to stall those famiglie with her funny business, what good will it do, in the end?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Boss, bad news!
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: Out with it.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: It's Lappland! She suddenly showed up at the estate and started chopping up our boys! She's making her way over to you!
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: Stop her.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You got it!
attributes.name: Saluzzo Mafioso

attributes.content: Lappland, you sure have gotten good at killing.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Back in the day, you would've taken a lot longer and picked up a few more scars on your way here.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You haven't changed at all. You don't even bat an eye at your own boys getting killed.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What's the point in crying over some incompetent associates?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: What about an incompetent child? Oh, spiacente, I almost forgot that for you, there's no basically difference between an associate and your own child.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You know what I hate more than anything else, ragazza? Incompetent idiots who are also obedient.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I've been waiting a long time for you, ever since you came back home.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Waiting for you to bare your fangs at me.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: And now, that time has finally come.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Tell me, figlia mia. All these years, what is it that has made you like this? What made you disobey me, rebel against me time and time again?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Speak up, so I can discipline you.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Upon hearing Alberto's words, Lappland cracks a smile.
However, she lowers the weapons in her hands.
For the longest time, I've been thinking if I should try rubbing you out.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Surely, killing your own father isn't something that would give you a moment's hesitation.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: It's not the act that I'm conflicted over, more the meaning of it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The meaning? A woman like you cares to go searching for meaning in things?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Meaning is pretty important to me. Like profit is to you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Padre mio, do you know why I care so much about Texas?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You've never explained it to me.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: From the moment I was born, I grew up a part of this famiglia.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You raised me with the most proper Siracusan education, and I met your expectations.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: As a Siracusan, I am second to none.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And here I thought you never acknowledged who you were, ragazza.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: When do you think I managed to wiggle out of your control?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Or I guess, not from your control, but from Siracusa. From the famiglia. From our blood. From the control of our rules.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I hated it, all of it. But in the end, I couldn't actually escape any of it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: All those things are like the strings of a marionette over my head.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: No matter how much I rebelled, in the end, I'm still dancing in the palm of your hand.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: There's no way out.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Only you would look at Siracusa and see an inescapable swamp.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: And everybody—including you, padre—you're all scum, whether you realize it or not.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Of course, I didn't realize it, at that age.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The old me thought she was crazy enough, rebellious enough. But looking back, I was just in denial.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And you thought I'd grow out of it after a few years. Isn't that right?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That goes without saying.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I was well aware of your rebelliousness, but I never understood where it came from.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: From you being so totally convinced that your way of life, and your actions, were completely right.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You never doubted for a second that I would eventually become you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And that's... when she appeared.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: At first, it was because there was someone out there, in far-off Columbia, who was better than me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Cellinia Texas, the granddaughter of Salvadore.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Cold. Strong. Honorable and loyal.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: After popping back over here, she quickly became the most famous Siracusan among all the famiglie.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Even though she was Columbian.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're just as good as her.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Hah, of course.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But that's not the important part.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The important part is, she clearly was a Siracusan, thoroughly poisoned by the swamp of this city.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But in the end, she chose to turn her back on her blood, letting her entire famiglia get liquidated.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The blame for that rests only with Giuseppe. Where is Cellinia's sin in the righteous judgment of her kin?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Not like betrayal is particularly rare among wolves.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But she chose to turn her back. She chose to get out.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Can you imagine, padre?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That day, when I found out she wanted to leave Siracusa, to leave everything behind, I was so...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Exhilarated!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You figured it was an act of rebellion, and a successful one?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: She didn't succeed. I knew from the beginning that the land itself wasn't going to let her go.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So, why are you standing here in front of me again, for her?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: For her?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: No, padre mio. No.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I'm here not because I learned anything in particular from her successes and failures.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But because she taught me that the choice exists in the first place.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I knew she would eventually return here. And I looked forward to seeing what she would do once she came back.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And she did absolutely nothing.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: No. You don't understand.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: She made up her mind.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Cellinia, what do you think you're doing?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: You don't need to know. And you're not going to.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You ran away from Columbia before, and from Siracusa. You ran from it all.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: And now, you have the stones to stand on this soil again.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Isn't that kind of ridiculous?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: This land isn't a lost cause.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So, I'm not running away anymore. Simple as that.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You stopped running, so you came back.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: But what about the people you left behind?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Go tell that to them!
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Blame it all on me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You decided you had to kill Giovanna, so you pinned the blame on me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm not that shameless yet.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: But, you will pay for it all the same.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You're gonna have to die, Cellinia.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Don't worry, death is where I belong.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Damn... you...
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Now, it's my turn.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: This used to keep me up at night.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But when I finally stood in front of you, face-to-face, I realized—
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: This was never such a difficult thing in the first place.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Turns out, it's not that I wanted to rebel against you, or kill you.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: All I need to do is say goodbye. To you, my dear father, to this famiglia, to this swamp.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That's why I'm here.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You want to become an enemy to all of Siracusa.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Siracusa became my enemy.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Goodbye forever, padre.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland gives her father a deep parting bow.
A vague thought creeps across Alberto's mind—this is his best chance to be rid of this monster.
That's right. Monster.
A monster he raised with his own two hands.
She is by no means invincible, but it seems like nothing is capable of touching her.
He is a hundred percent sure that if he strikes now, he would be able to slay his daughter on the spot.
She is by no means dauntless, yet she chose to throw away everything she had to throw away.
He knows he should act now, to rid himself of future headaches.
But...
'Padre.'
She is a monster. And yet, one that he raised with his own two hands.
If all she wanted was simple freedom, why would she still come to see him?
Lone wolves eventually remember the pack to which they belonged. But after today, his daughter will no longer belong to any pack.
Alberto lets out a heavy sigh.
The next time I see you, I will kill you. My daughter. My pride. My traitor.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Lappland smiles, but does not answer.
She is no longer a lone wolf.
Never again will Siracusa have a place for her.
And never again will she need one.
The only thing left is you, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Are you sure letting Cellinia go alone was the right call?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Don't sweat it.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: She asked to go herself, so she must've had a reason for it.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You don't want to find out what that reason is?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lemme give you a little tip. One of the prerequisites for being a good partner is to never ask your counterpart about stuff she doesn't wanna share!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You two have a great relationship.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You betcha!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You've got somebody coming up on you. He's moving really fast.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Just one?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Yeah, just one.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Black hair, dressed like a really flamboyant mob boss, holding two pistol-shaped wands.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...Leon?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia... I knew it'd be you.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo, why did you come here?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'm looking for you. But you cut all communication with the famiglia, so I haven't been able to get through.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: While I was looking around, I overheard wise guys from another famiglia talking about how someone had blocked off some passages in the secondary core area, which didn't sound like something any of us would do.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Which is why I came here.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That's right... You were with Carracci so long, you must've known this was the best place to break through.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But, I have nothing more to say to you, Leon.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Wait, Lavinia...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'm here to—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leon?! Lavinia, and the court guys too...
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Alright, so you're the one who's been messing around with the secondary core area behind our backs.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Leon, where the hell did you go after that meeting? Don't tell me you've been with her this whole time.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: No, I went looking for my father.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Why didn't you tell me?!
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Because when I was face-to-face with Alberto, when I heard the things that carwash worker had to say about me, I finally realized—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I've been wrong my entire life.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That's why...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Demetri and Lavinia stand on opposite sides of the wide avenue.
Leontuzzo takes a deep breath, and finally walks over to Lavinia's side.
That's your answer, huh?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: From now on, I am no longer Don Bellone.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leon... you know what this means, don't you?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I do.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Do you?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: No matter how grand the Don's ideals were, he still chose to abandon his famiglia!
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: And you, no matter how grand your ideals may be, you're gonna do the same?!
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: We're a famiglia, goddammit, Leontuzzo!
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Look me in the eye and answer me!
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: We grew up together. We've been through so much together.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Does all of that mean nothing to you?!
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: My father saw the famiglia as nothing more than a match to light the fuse of a new era in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: He was wrong in his ways, but...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo gradually raises his eyes and looks directly at Demetri.
In the end, I'll stand against all famiglie.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Since it's bound to happen sooner or later—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Let's not drag out the suffering, Demetri.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Just when everything is about to teeter over the edge, a chill engulfs everyone present.

attributes.text: Not even your bones will remain.

attributes.content: What... is this...?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Urgh... There's a voice... in my head...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: A black fog congeals around the area.
As the fog condenses, an impalpable coercion gradually presses down on the heads, shoulders, and hearts gathered there.
From this coercion they feel a thread of kinship, as if its very existence is entangled with the blood in their veins. No, it is indeed an existence entangled with their blood.
But the thread immediately snaps, leaving only bottomless fear behind. Because within this coercion broils bottomless anger.
In this moment, all reason is suppressed, as if a voice is screaming out to them—
Bow down.
Surrender.
It's freezing cold...
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Those unable to bear the pressure fall one by one, until only Leontuzzo, Lavinia, and Demetri remain standing.
I remember this feeling...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leontuzzo turns his gaze towards the entity emerging from the coalesced fog—
Watch out, there's something off about that stuff!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...Il Signore dei Lupi.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Before the words leave his lips, a pack of wolves formed from the fog lunges at Leontuzzo and the others.
